alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS APPROACHING LAKE MOULTRIE AND EASTERN LAKE MARION... A line of showers and thunderstorms will move across both Lake Moultrie and the eastern portions of Lake Marion through 4 PM. Gusty winds and cloud to water lightning along with localized visibilities of 3 NM or less can be expected. Locally choppy waves could also occur. Mariners should be prepared to seek safe harbor as this activity approaches. Remember, lightning can strike many miles from a thunderstorms. When thunder roars, go indoors.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio All Hazards or the Internet for the latest information from the National Weather Service.
